title: Introducing: Art of Sleeping
body:
Australian act [Art of Sleeping](https://www.

facebook.com/theartofsleeping "Art of Sleeping") have made an exciting comeback after a 2 year break since their ‘Like a Thief’ EP. They arrive with a slightly heavier style then before, morphing into a _Black Keys_ kinda sound, which is well worth a listen. Excited for their new album which will be out later this year, but for now, check out the video for their track ‘Crazy’ below (which might just make you want to become a groupie).
